fatalError.attachErrors: Please attach these error messages in the email:

content.0: According to studies X% of users leave the website if it takes longer than three seconds to load it.
content.1: Generally around X% of users browse websites with their mobile devices, such as phones.
content.2: For those reasons we use our own software platform which is optimized for the loading speed of our websites. In the development process we use a "Mobile first" -strategy, with which the website is developed primarily for mobile devices.
content.3: This platform is not used in our less expensive "WordPress" -websites.
